title: Podcast Wissenschaft: Spectrum - Marijuana, sex, soccer and sleep
description: If Marijuana can make old mice brains younger, does that work with humans too? What is the point of monogamy if our instincts tell us to have sex with as many people as possible? And can robots help us fall asleep?
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Wissenschaft, Podcast, Marijuana, Sex, Roboter, WM2018
